name: In re Nomination Petition of Babette JOSEPHS for the 182nd District in the Pennsylvania House of Representatives. Appeal of Dolores A. Cohen-Lowry
name_abbreviation: In re Nomination Petition of Josephs

judges: BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, and BALDWIN, JJ.
parties: In re Nomination Petition of Babette JOSEPHS for the 182nd District in the Pennsylvania House of Representatives. Appeal of Dolores A. Cohen-Lowry.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of May, 2006, we AFFIRM the Order of the Commonwealth Court.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Sharon Lee Suleta, Esq., Laura Walsh Kern, Esq., Philadelphia, for Dolores A. Cohen-Lowry.
Lionel C. Artom-Ginzburg, Esq., for Babette Josephs.
Louis Lawrence Boyle, Esq., for Bureau of Elections.
Margaret M. Tartaglione, for City Commissioners of Philadelphia.
casebody.head_matter:
897 A.2d 1167
In re Nomination Petition of Babette JOSEPHS for the 182nd District in the Pennsylvania House of Representatives. Appeal of Dolores A. Cohen-Lowry.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 17, 2006.
Decided May 22, 2006.
Sharon Lee Suleta, Esq., Laura Walsh Kern, Esq., Philadelphia, for Dolores A. Cohen-Lowry.
Lionel C. Artom-Ginzburg, Esq., for Babette Josephs.
Louis Lawrence Boyle, Esq., for Bureau of Elections.
Margaret M. Tartaglione, for City Commissioners of Philadelphia.
BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, and BALDWIN, JJ.
